title: Sudden Influx of Karma Supports taking Courage to become unkillable.
body:
Not even going to discuss the bullshit that is Courage of the %%%% which makes melee champs with click to target CC unkillable, but ranged champs getting the full benefit of it as well? 


Inb4 just dodge her Q, cause it really isn't the issue I am having with her .
(although even when she misses the Q, she still gets to take 20% of your health)

It always goes like this

>Karma hits level 3
> Karma presses W for click to target goodness
> Karma presses E for maximum movespeed
> Short of blowing your escape you won't break the 1000 unit tether
>  If you fail to break it, she lands a guarenteed empowered Q, and also gains a shield for 20% of her max health.
>  If you break it, you're under your tower, with lower mana and less farm than you would if it was anyone else

If the autist decides to run under tower and loses some health, she just ult Ws you and heals it back.

Any tips? 

Banning her is all I can do to avoid her ruining my games.

replies.body:
Haven't had a chance to try it out but here are my thoughts. 

It sounds like you sacrifice the strength of your shields (Windspeaker's) or pure damage (Thunderlord's) for potential early lane dominance. I imagine that outside of lane phase it's less useful than other options but how you're supposed to get there is what you're asking. 

It's a tough call. Surviving relies on your lane being coordinated enough to last the time the tether takes to activate and the shield expires (6 seconds). It's possible that if you're already rooted it's too late, which means avoiding that scenario is going to be your best bet.

You could break the tether with a dash or, unfortunately, flash. Never stand in her range so that she is able to tether in the first place. Poke her early so she is less inclined to play aggressive. Stand way back and punish if she oversteps. Attempt to freeze the lane just outside of tower range?

I don't know. Depending on the match up, there's a chance you might have to sacrifice minions sometimes. Maybe that's the best you hope for. If you don't outright lose the lane you should have a chance of bringing it back later. Courage shouldn't be such a problem during team fights if your team works together. 

Sorry I can't be more concrete but I hope that helps.
That mastery i have found to be amazing on Renekton due to his W and Darius due to his E. It is definitely a strong mastery pick.
